medical_history.history_of_present_illness: RUQ pain has persisted over three days, with poor PO intake due to pain but continued bowel movements and flatus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of ETOH pancreatitis, benign CBD stricture related to pancreatitis, plastic stent placement x2, fully covered metal stent placement. Past medical history includes back pain, L1 compression fracture 1 month ago, tonsillectomy, broken arm as a child, pneumonia as a child. No hospitalizations as an adult.
medical_history.family_history: Sister has diabetes mellitus. Father had myocardial infarction at age unspecified. Brother has pancreatitis from ETOH.
